alert.note: Alert for Atchison; Holt; Nodaway (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 6:12PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Atchison, northwestern Holt and northwestern Nodaway Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 612 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Nemaha, or 7 miles southeast of Auburn, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tarkio, Mound City, Rock Port, Fairfax, Burlington Junction, Skidmore, Craig, Blanchard, Elmo, Big Lake, Westboro, Watson, Quitman, Fortescue, Bigelow, Corning, Phelps City, Indian Cave State Park and Iowa Reservation of Kansas and Nebraska. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 82 and 123. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
